title: Ayaneo introduces Pocket DMG Limited Edition Bright Silver with Snapdragon G3x Gen 2 and OLED display
description: Ayaneo has updated the Pocket DMG over a year after its original release. Still one of the most powerful vertical gaming handhelds around, the Ayaneo Pocket DMG now comes in a fresh limited edition colour option with a cheaper starting price to boot.
content: Nonetheless, this chipset still makes the Pocket Silver considerably more powerful than competing vertical gaming handhelds, including the upcoming Anbernic RG477V. Moreover, the Bright Silver option… [+443 chars]
